parameters:
\N<Ryuda Soldier>I'm on guard duty. If you have no business, please don't
speak to me.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
\N<Riia>Daddy.
\N<Segi>...Lord Yuia.

\N<Yuia>What's wrong, Segi and Riia? Did you both come to pick me
up?

\N<Riia>That's right. I could have been fine staying home alone, but
Mom said we should go together.
\N<Segi>Oh, is that so... Hehe.
\N<Yuia>I see. She's such a helpless mom, spoiling Riia like that.
\N<Riia>Ahaha, that's so true~.

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia, was today's meeting... as turbulent as expected?
Is that why it went on for so long?

\N<Yuia>Yeah... It was as expected. But it was a meeting with a
foregone conclusion.

\N<Segi>Is that so... So the permanent stationing of the Ryuda in
this city is an unavoidable situation...

\N<Yuia>...Yes. In a few days, a new commander from the main Ryuda
forces will replace the current provisional commander here.
\N<Segi>A new commander from the Ryuda...

\N<Yuia>It can't be helped. It's better to kneel from the start than
to fight them carelessly and suffer wounds that won't heal.
That's what most of the people in this city think.
\N<Segi>How can that be... but...

\N<Yuia>Of course, it's not like I don't have anything I want to
say. However... I can't blame them.

\N<Yuia>It must have been a bitter decision for them too. A heart-
wrenching decision made to protect the city, their families,
and their loved ones.

\N<Segi>Is that so... Yes, you're right. When I think about it
calmly, maybe what the people of the city are saying is
correct. Perhaps I lost my composure due to my hatred for
them...

\N<Yuia>Hatred for them... If that's the case, then I'm the same as
you. I haven't forgotten about that day for a moment.
op_スーイア1e

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia... I'm truly sorry. Because of me, the opportunity
to avenge the Grand Duke and Princess Consort...

\N<Yuia>You've been saying the same thing for years. You know I
shouldn't be blaming you, right?

\N<Yuia>Don't misunderstand me. I owe my life to you and your
parents.
\N<Segi>Lord Yuia...

\N<Yuia>Also, there was another topic at the meeting... The Ryuda
folks gave us some rather unpleasant news.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Yuia>The details of the so-called "Training Assembly" that Ryuda
is planning were conveyed. There will be an announcement to
gather the townspeople later on.
\N<Segi>I see...

\N<Riia>Hey, Dad. Mom. What are you talking about? Let's go home
already~.

\N<Yuia>Haha, right. Let's head back home. It's gotten quite late,
and Daddy is hungry too.
line
town3

Several years after Yuia and Segi left the "Dawn Grain"
castle... "They," the Ryuda, came to this city.

In response to their demands for either surrender or battle,
the city council communicated surrender to them, on the
condition of ensuring the lives and safety of the residents.
A

\N<Man>Isn't that Miss Segi? If you have no business here, it's
better not to go any further.

\N<Man>This place used to be a school for the town's children, but
now it has completely changed into an educational facility
for Luda.

\N<Ryuda Soldier>What business do you have, speaking so casually to the
vanguard of Ryuda like some commoner?

\N<Segi>...This is the Lyuda Educational District. I have no
business here right now.
